value.halfverse:
for you have blessed us in Christ
with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places.
value.verse: Blessed are you, the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, *
Before the world was made, you chose us to be yours in Christ, *
value.halfverse: that we should be holy and blameless before you.

value.verse: You destined us for adoption as your children through Jesus Christ, *
value.halfverse: according to the good pleasure of your will,
that you have freely given us in the Beloved.
value.verse: To the praise of your glorious grace, *
In you, we have redemption through the blood of Christ, *

value.halfverse: which you have lavished upon us.
value.verse: According to the riches of your grace *
You have made known to us, in all wisdom and insight, *
According to your good pleasure which you set forth in Christ, *
value.halfverse: as a plan for the fullness of time,
things in heaven and things on earth.
value.verse: To gather together all things in Christ, *
